Anies Minta Keanehan Anggaran DKI Dikoreksi Bukan Diramaikan, Ini Respons PSI
04 Nov 2019, 06:21 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan mengimbau masyarakat agar membantu mengoreksi kerja Pemprov DKI, khususnya terkait anggaran DKI dengan cara mengoreksi bukan meramaikan masalah itu. Sebagai pihak yang pertama kali menyoroti kesalahan anggaran Pemprob DKI, apa kata PSI?
"Kami nggak mau ramai-ramai. Kami sudah bersurat sejak awal bulan Agustus untuk diunggah ke website tapi sampai sekarang sudah di-take-down semua. Apa yang kami lakukan semata-mata menjalankan sumpah jabatan untuk menjaga uang rakyat. Gubernur punya opini seperti itu hak beliau," kata Anggota Fraksi PSI DPRD DKI Jakarta, William Aditya Sarana kepada wartawan, Senin (4/11/2019).
William mengatakan, sebelumnya pihaknya sudah berkirim surat ke Pemprov DKI untuk segera mengunggah dokumen perencanaan APBD 2020. Hal itu dilakukan agar publik dapat berpartisipasi dalam pembahasan rencana APBD 2020. Sehingga anggaran-anggaran tak wajar juga dapat segera ditemukan untuk dikoreksi.
"Partisipasi publik dalam setiap pembahasan rencana anggaran sangat penting. Kalau nunggu disahkan sudah telat kasih masukan," ujarnya.

Anies Asks DKI's Budget Oddities Corrected Not Enlivened, This Is PSI's Response
Nov 04 2019, 06:21 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan appealed to the public to help correct the work of the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government, especially related to the DKI budget by correcting rather than enlivening the problem. As the party that first highlighted the mistakes of the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government's budget, what did PSI say?
"We don't want to be busy. We have written since the beginning of August to be uploaded to the website but until now all of them have been taken down. What we have done is simply carrying out an oath of office to protect public money. The Governor has an opinion like that his rights, "said DKI Jakarta DPRD PSI Faction Member William Aditya Sarana to reporters on Monday (11/04/2019).
William said, previously his party had sent a letter to the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government to immediately upload the 2020 APBD planning document. This was done so that the public could participate in discussing the 2020 APBD plan. So that unnatural budgets could also be immediately found to be corrected.
"Public participation in every discussion of the budget plan is very important. If you wait for it to be passed, it will be too late to give input," he said.
